properties.Observatio: A water tank measuring 1.5m long and 1.5m wide is being constructed to distribute water to thirty families. The Existing tank is in a dilapidated condition. The constructed tank is in a dilapidated condition.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of a Water Tank ((1.5m x1.5m x 1.5m)

Site preparation & setting out

Plywood form work including making, fixing & removing for structure ?05 uses

Cutting, Bending & Placing tor steel reinforcement bars

1:2:4 concrete with concrete mixer

properties.Observatio: A bathing place (Pihilla) has been created for bathing using this water source.
properties.Descriptio:
Planting Trees around the Peella

Vegetative cover improving around the water source with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m grid interv

properties.Observatio: There is a reserve of about two acres. The reserve consists of well-grown natural trees. A water project is underway to distribute water to about thirty families using the spring located within the reserve. It is advisable to build a water filtration sys
properties.Descriptio:

properties.Observatio: Forests in the protected area have been cut down and cleared. About three hundred families obtain water for domestic needs from the spring located within the reserve. Water flowing from springs within the reserve is used for paddy cultivation.
